items.title: minimize two loss functions in Keras
items.body:
I want to minimize two loss functions the mean squared error and the KL Divergence. It is possible to implement this on Keras something like

loss =tf.keras.losses.KLDivergence() + tf.keras.losses.MeanSquaredError()
model.compile(optimizer="Adam",
              loss=loss 
              )

This code gives me error, as I can't sum those functions
